interface.name: AS_FS_CRD_customerRelationSingle
interface.description: contains single card displayed on customer summary
interface.definition:
#"_a-0000e77d-004e-8000-9c08-011c48011c48_2837892"( contents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideLayout"( items: { /*ICON*/ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"( item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_stampField"( labelPosition: "COLLAPSED", icon: "sitemap", text: "", backgroundColor: "SECONDARY", contentColor: "STANDARD", size: "TINY", tooltip: ri!relatedCustomer.name ), width: "MINIMIZE" ), /*CustomerName*/ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"( item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"( labelPosition: "COLLAPSED", value: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"( text: #"_a-0000e50d-bf1d-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_981831"( customer: ri!relatedCustomer, includeCustomerAcronym: false, i18nData: ri!i18nData ), color: "STANDARD", size: "STANDARD", style: { "STRONG" },
), char(10), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"( text: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(icon: "percent"), " ", proper( #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_81818"( i18nData: ri!i18nData, bundleKey: if( ri!pendingCustomerRelationDisplay.objectForDisplay.fromCustomerId = ri!currentCustomer.customerId, "AS.FS.AllBundles.txt_XPercentOwned", ri!pendingCustomerRelationDisplay.objectForDisplay.toCustomerId = ri!currentCustomer.customerId, "AS.FS.AllBundles.lbl_OwnsXPercent", "" ), arguments: ri!pendingCustomerRelationDisplay.objectForDisplay.percentOwned ) ), " ", #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(icon: "user-circle"), "Â ", #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_81818"( i18nData: ri!i18nData, bundleKey: if( ri!pendingCustomerRelationDisplay.objectForDisplay.fromCustomerId = ri!currentCustomer.customerId, "AS.FS.AllBundles.lbl_Child", ri!pendingCustomerRelationDisplay.objectForDisplay.toCustomerId = ri!currentCustomer.customerId, "AS.FS.AllBundles.lbl_Parent", "" ) ) }, color: "SECONDARY", size: "SMALL" ) } ) ), /*Open Events tag*/ a!localVariables( local!openEventsTag: #"_a-0000e6e2-62e5-8000-9bfe-011c48011c48_2470049"( i18nData: ri!i18nData, pendingObjectDisplays: ri!pendingCustomerRelationDisplay, applyFieldFilter: false ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"( item: local!openEventsTag, width: "MINIMIZE", showWhen: #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_75782"(local!openEventsTag) ) ) }, alignVertical: "MIDDLE", spacing: "STANDARD" ) )

a:ruleInputTestConfigs.a:value: a!localvariables( local!customer: #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_33079"( returnType: #"_a-0000e415-3035-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_290157" ), local!existingCustomerRelations: #"_a-0000e50d-bf1d-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_975253"( customerId: local!customer.customerId, returnType: #"_a-0000e415-3035-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_290157" ), local!pendingCustomerRelationsForDisplay: #"_a-0000e6e2-62e5-8000-9bfe-011c48011c48_2481828"( customerId: local!customer.customerId, existingCustomerRelations: local!existingCustomerRelations ), local!pendingCustomerRelationsForDisplay )
